name: channel
question: In what channel should I run this?

name: whenToAskForDailyGoals
question: When should I ask each person about their goals for the day? (ie. 9am)

name: whenToDisplayGoals
question: When should I display everyone's goals for others to see? (ie. 12pm)

name: whenToAskForOutcome
question: When should I ask people how their day went? (ie. 6pm)

name: whenToShowReport
question: When should I display a report on how everyone did? (ie. 11:59pm)

name: whenToRemind
question: When should I remind people to answer if they haven't already? (ie. 11pm)
